# License File Generator/Validator

Generate and validate licenses for your software.

### Requirements:

```
Python 3.11+
```

### Run:

```
pip install -r requirements.txt
python main.py
```

### Example License File:

```
-----BEGIN LICENSE-----
Product: Product Name
License Owner: Company Name
License Type: Commercial
Expire Date: 2030-01-01
Signature: 
-----END LICENSE-----
```
